sentences.english: The Customs valuation of inward and outward articles shall be determined by the Customs according to law.
sentences.chinese: 进出境物品的完税价格，由海关依法确定。

sentences.english: Certificate of payment of value-added tax or export goods tax-paid slip.
sentences.chinese: 增值税税收缴款书或出口货物完税分割单。

sentences.english: What we want is to A's share of duty-paid single-handled.
sentences.chinese: 我们要的就是A公司办理的那份完税单。

sentences.english: Export duties are not included in the customs value.
sentences.chinese: 出口关税不计入完税价格。

sentences.english: All shipments must be made on Delivered Duty Paid.
sentences.chinese: 所有的货运都要在完税后才交货。

sentences.english: The dutiable value shall be rounded off to RMB fen.
sentences.chinese: 完税价格采用四舍五入法计算至分。

sentences.english: I always saved my tax records.
sentences.chinese: 我总是留着我的完税证明。

sentences.english: “At the end of the day, Microsoft does not pay taxes in France, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: “在结账的时候，微软并没有在法国完税，”他说。

sentences.english: VAT indicated on the payment receipts obtained from the customs office.
sentences.chinese: 从海关取得的完税凭证上注明的增值税额。

sentences.english: The format of a tax paid certificate shall be determined by the State Administration of Taxation.
sentences.chinese: 完税凭证的式样，由国家税务总局制定。

sentences.english: Where it is impossible to ascertain the transaction value, the dutiable price shall be assessed by the Customs in accordance with law.
sentences.chinese: 成交价格不能确定时，完税价格由海关依法估定。

sentences.english: The dutiable price for inward and outward articles shall be determined by the Customs in accordance with law.
sentences.chinese: 进出境物品的完税价格，由海关依法确定。

definition: to pay a tax one has evaded/to pay an overdue tax
to file an income tax return/to declare dutiable goods (at customs)
personal income tax (abbr. for 個人所得稅|个人所得税)
